title: Coco the Chameleon
description: Coco the Chameleon loves who she is, inside and out...until her first day of school. When Coco meets her new classmates, she suddenly wishes she could be anyone other than herself...but what if she really could be?Would Coco discover that being herself is actually the best of all?Full of colorful illustrations and relatable feelings, Coco the Chameleon's inspiring journey to self-acceptance will leave readers feeling confident and proud to be who they are! Read along as Coco learns to love and celebrate herself for who she uniquely is!
author: Stefanie Annis
